button_drag_resize.componentleveltooltip: Drag to see before and after

button_reset.componentleveltooltip: Reset the Levers of Fate settings

limitless_wom.componentleveltooltip: Infinite Winds of Magic || When checked, Winds of Magic reserves will be limitless in battle.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: DoIfElse(RootComponent.Dimensions.x > 1900, self.Resize(1470, self.Dimensions.y, false), self.Resize(1185, self.Dimensions.y, false))
